data.comment: The big names in today's match at Kenilworth Road have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 22, Goal! Luton have got their heads in front thanks to a Glen Rea strike.
Great play from Martin Cranie to set up the goal.
Nicholas Ioannou (Nottingham) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Kenilworth Road.
The second-half is underway at Kenilworth Road.
Nottingham make their first substitution with Carl Jenkinson replacing Sammy Ameobi.
In the minute 55, Ruddock Pelly for Luton has been booked by Tim Robinson and receives a first yellow card.
Glen Rea blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-1.
Martin Cranie (Luton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Luton's Glen Rea has been booked in Luton.
Nathan Jones is making the team's first substitution at Kenilworth Road with Kazenga LuaLua replacing Elliott Lee.
The home team replace Tom Lockyer with Jordan Clark.
In the minute 84, George Moncur is replacing Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall for the home team.
